titleStmt.title: The gentleman apothecary being a late and true story, turned out of French: with several letters.
Apoticaire dévalisé, comédie burlesque. English
titleStmt.author: Villiers, Claude Deschamps, sieur de, 1600?-1681.

notesStmt.note: By Claude Deschamps sieur de Villiers.
A translation (possibly by Sir Roger L'Estrange -- cf. DNB) of "L'Apoticaire dévalisé, comédie burlesque" by Claude Deschamps sieur de Villiers.
Reproduction of the original in the William Andrews Clark Memoral Library.
